messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Space Station 13. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: if you don't exterminate all those zombies now we will consider dropping a nuke on that station of yours

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We hear you're having troubles over there, our hotel is just a parsec away, and you can reach it by short-range teleporter. We have our own security staff and warm beds, so pack your things and pay us a visit! Ask your command team about taking a teleporter to Twin-Nexus!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: we forgot to tell you we removed all your teleportation equipment due to the infection have a nice day

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: warning large scale EMP detected in your sector expect shortages

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Don't forget to stop in at the Twin-Nexus hotel for a safe space, getaway! No zombies or any kind of danger, we even have our own armed staff!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: we are sending our top operative to deal with your situation have a nice day.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Officer AMERICA. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Space Station 13 door subroutines. Severity level of 2. Recommend station AI involvement.
